There are no plans to add a statusbar to ModernWindow. The page layout do however include room for a custom statusbar per page, as shown in wireframe page of the mui demo app.



If you need a permanent statusbar, you can create a custom ModernWindow template.
How do I programmatically reference those sections (root, page, header, content, status)?
